nodes.text: A male bully used a rock to smash a toy Star Destroyer belonging to the Human child Harsh. Harsh, despite being smaller than the bully, took the rock from the other child and smashed the bully's face with it.
The bully was mentioned in Unusual Suspects, an article written by Andrew Hind and published in Wizards of the Coasts' Star Wars Gamer 6 in July of 2001.
